page.title: 06The Gamekeeper
page.content: Mr.Minty is a gamekeeper on Lawrence End Estate. Mr.Minty is my Daddy. Sometimes my daddy takes my brother Robert and I out with him. My daddy has got lots of pheasant chicks at the moment. The pheasants lay the eggs and then he puts them in the incubators. When the chicks are 6 weeks old daddy puts them out in the woods . Daddy clips their wings so that they do not fly away. In the Winter daddy has shoot days. Mr. Bouvrie(who lives at Lawrence End) has a party and they shoot the pheasants. Katie Minty
